name: RepRapBCN Downloads Page
tagline: Here you can download all the files related to your favourite Open Source 3D printer, the BCN3D+.
body:
### Welcome to the Downloads Page.
Here you'll find all the files to work with your BCN3D+. We decided to make our documentation even more available, that's why we've created this Downloads Page inside a GitHub repository. Even more, every file is in a repository so you can keep track of any change and be up to date.
If you don't know yet about this technology, take a look at this.
Our project is Open Source so feel free to download anything you need and help us improve along the way. **Be part of the community!**
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
